tweet:
Thinking of and praying for my dear friend @repjohnlewis. 

You inspire us all! 

Be strong!

I am appalled by the attacks in Monsey, NY.

Hate has no place in NY and we must speak with one voice in condemning these vile acts.

New Yorkers of all faiths stand with our Jewish community and we are praying for the victims and their families.

Carefully monitoring reports of another assault in Williamsburg on two Jewish children @NYCHA Monday in BK. These vile acts cannot be tolerated. This is why I have authored legislation to dedicate more fed‘l funds to prevent & prosecute hate crimes.

Wishing a joyous holiday season to everyone and a Merry Christmas to all who are celebrating today.  

Amidst the celebrations, let's also recommit to caring for our neighbors and building stronger communities. 

Wishing happy holidays to you and yours! pic.twitter.com/dZx6aPP37Q

Read my op-ed with @CarlinaRivera about how we need a national conversation on adequately funding our public housing system. @GothamGazette https://www.gothamgazette.com/opinion/9019-whats-really-been-missing-from-the-democratic-presidential-debate-stage-nycha-public-housing …
All I want for the holidays is for Mitch McConnell to finally start doing his job and holding votes on the hundreds of bipartisan bills the House has passed & sent the Senate.

As the sun sets tonight on #NY7, we wish all of our neighbors who are celebrating the miracle of #Hanukkah a peaceful and joyous celebration. Amidst the celebrations, this year, let's also rededicate ourselves to economic, social and cultural justice. 

Chag Chanukah sameach! pic.twitter.com/TaZE6ZHqtX

I'm pleased the funding bill that just passed the House & Senate contains $45 million to address problems like lead in public housing at agencies like @NYCHA. We need more, but this is a meaningful start. 

My thanks to @SenSchumer & @NitaLowey for helping secure these funds!

The NRA has made opposing CDC study of gun violence a priority. 

Despite their opposition, our gov't will FINALLY treat gun violence like the public health epidemic that it is!

It's been a busy week, so you may have missed this news. For the 1st time, Congress allocated money to study gun violence, an important (albeit far from sufficient) step. 
I've previously introduced legislation to do this. Glad to see it finally happen! https://www.cnn.com/2019/12/17/politics/gun-research-congress-spending-bill-cdc-trnd/index.html …

I am carefully monitoring reports from NYCHA tenants who are without heat and I am in touch with the agency.

Residents should also be certain to call the NYCHA Customer Contact Center at 718-707-7771 if they have any heat or hot water issues.

Thank you CPI for tirelessly shedding the light on Puerto Rico's most pressing issues. Congratulations on this most deserved award. 

Ustedes son un orgullo Boricua! https://nieman.harvard.edu/news/2019/12/puerto-ricos-centro-de-periodismo-investigativo-wins-louis-m-lyons-award-for-conscience-and-integrity-in-journalism-at-harvard/ …

When @realDonaldTrump mocks a legend like John Dingell and the pain of his widow, a public servant in her own right, Trump only makes himself look like a small coward & reminds us of what a giant Mr. Dingell was in American politics. I stand with my friend @RepDebDingell.

There's no pleasure to be taken in today's vote, but it was necessary.

I will never look back on this day with joy, but will reflect on it with a recognition that we performed our solemn Congressional duty.

#ImpeachmentDay

The betrayal of a U.S. ally, battling for its very existence with one of our adversaries – Russia, is the exact definition of a #GeopoliticalShakedown.

It’s why I'm imploring my colleagues to hold Trump accountable, to #DefendOurDemocracy & preserve our Republic. #ImpeachmentDay pic.twitter.com/rJYrETVQfa

Just spoke on the House floor during the impeachment debate. 

If we do not hold this President accountable, we have failed the people who sent us here and we will have abdicated our own oath to defend the constitution. 

I will be voting for impeachment. pic.twitter.com/C064VmWONC

Former Republican Members of Congress know what their oaths meant. 

Why don’t today’s Republicans? 

#DefendOurDemocracy pic.twitter.com/8hhkOzpylG
Thank you!

I was proud to work with @RepMaxRose & @RepJerryNadler to ensure House-passed FY2020 spending bills end the federal prohibition of split-tolling on the Verrazzano-Narrows Bridge. 

This will improve traffic throughout NYC! 

Great win for BK, Manhattan, Queens, & SI!

For this Admin to call others corrupt including Puerto Rico is absurd. The fact is this President failed 3.4 million of our fellow citizens in #PR repeatedly through cruelty and incompetence. We will hold @realdonaldtrump accountable. https://politi.co/2r7IsK4

Today, I stood proudly w/ @repadams, @speakerpelosi @whipclyburn & more as we voted to PERMANENTLY reauthorize funding for #HBCU’s & #MSI’s. Congress has a responsibility to support these institutions #ForTheFUTURE of our minority students who deserve equal opportunity to succeed pic.twitter.com/utdE7NS77E
I will be voting against the FY 2020 Homeland Security 'minibus', which provides funding for Trump's hateful border wall and his anti-immigrant policies.

The deadline to receive coverage through  http://HealthCare.gov  has been extended through 3 am ET on Wednesday, December 18. Don’t miss your chance to #GetCovered.  https://www.healthcare.gov/  pic.twitter.com/DoL0gnV42D

✅Lower Healthcare Costs 
✅Higher Wages 
✅Support for Veterans
✅More . . .
More than 275 Bipartisan bills #ForThePeople are sitting on @senatemajldr desk. https://www.vox.com/2019/11/29/20977735/how-many-bills-passed-house-democrats-trump …

Important note: deadline for enrollment in the Affordable Care Act has been extended to 3 a.m. on December 18th. #ACA.  

Do not forget to enroll!

Joined w/ @SenWarren @SenatorMenendez @homelanddems @nrdems @transportdems in writing to @DHSOIG to conduct a review of Vieques' health center. @fema's failure to rebuild the facility is denying our neighbors in PR critical health services & is wrong. No more! pic.twitter.com/OOAVJcKFay

I am relieved the FY 2020 appropriations package the House will vote on this week is expected to provide funding for Puerto Rico's Medicaid program. 

We still need a long term solution, but am glad #PR is not being left behind.

My full statement here: pic.twitter.com/G2DsJprilq

El Censo determina la representación Congresional y el $ crítico para nuestras escuelas, salud y carreteras. 

¡Importante: El Censo NO incluye una pregunta sobre su ciudadanía!

Defienda lo suyo y déjese contar en el #Censo2020. 

Usted cuenta y Nueva York cuenta con usted. pic.twitter.com/vMBVcEWzPu

The census determines Congressional representation as well as critical 💲 for our schools, roads & healthcare. That's why everyone needs to be counted.

It's important to know: the census will NOT include a #citizenshipquestion. 

Stand up & #GetCounted in #Census2020 ✅ pic.twitter.com/tltWS8hOBT

#GreenLightNY goes into effect on Monday, Dec. 16th meaning that all New Yorkers, regardless of #immigration status, will be able to apply for a driver’s license. Head over to one of @MaketheRoadNY’s workshops or visit  http://licensesny.org  to learn more!

The FDIC's Board has voted to adopt a proposal from the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency that would greatly weaken the Community Reinvestment Act, potentially allowing racial discrimination in the banking industry. I'll be working with @FSCDems to stop this proposal! pic.twitter.com/431RN3Nzbx

Another apparent hate crime fueled by the rise in antisemitism in our country. These vile acts must be condemned by all of us. This is why I've authored legislation to make more fed'l resources available to local law enforcement in combatting these crimes. https://bit.ly/2RPZRSg
pic.twitter.com/pCBkp0OpeJ

Was proud to join with @RepAngieCraig
 & @RepSeanMaloney in leading 100+ colleagues in writing to oppose an @realDonaldTrump
HHS rule that would allow discrimination against #LGBTQ communities. https://www.nydailynews.com/news/politics/ny-trump-rule-lgbtq-discrimination-20191212-i75s2j2bcnbktf6djpq4ycj2sa-story.html …

Open Enrollment is here!

Now is the time to shop around, understand your options, and get covered by the December 15 deadline. 

Visit  http://healthcare.gov  to enroll today!

Joined today with @SpeakerPelosi, @RepKimSchrier, @RepShalala & other colleagues on the House steps as we prepare to pass #HR3, legislation to #LowerDrugCosts. 
So many NYers, seniors & working families will benefit from this bill to cut the costs of drugs like insulin and others pic.twitter.com/LsO8sC4vIK

Today I joined with Women Democratic Members of the House in demanding @senatemajldr do his job - and stop blocking House-passed legislation that benefits women & their families by addressing domestic violence, fixing #EqualPay and raising the minimum wage! pic.twitter.com/riZmxRVdRI

I was proud to work with my colleagues in the Progressive Caucus to improve #HR3 to protect more families harmed by skyrocketing prescription drug costs. 

I believe the bill we will vote on tomorrow will make important strides toward tackling this issue. https://twitter.com/USProgressives/status/1204597025205112843?s=20 …

As recognized by @grupocne in the 2019 NDAA we enacted a provision to further fed'l contracting opportunities with PR businesses. In this year’s NDAA we complement those efforts with incentives at subcontracting level to foster growth on the island https://twitter.com/grupocne/status/1045691183832420353 …

Hate crimes are on the rise around the nation. 
 
All of us must speak with one voice in condemning hate in all its forms. 

Those with hate in their hearts cannot win. We will not let them.  

We must be better than this.

I am heartbroken and outraged by the antisemitic attack on our neighbors in Jersey City. 

I was especially saddened to hear two of the victims had roots in our Williamsburg community. https://nyti.ms/2LHgYlh

BREAKING: federal courts just blocked @realDonaldTrump’s plan to steal military construction money from #PuertoRico and elsewhere to fund his border wall. 

Diverting this money would have made #PR less safe, while usurping Congress’ power of the purse. https://www.washingtonpost.com/immigration/federal-judge-blocks-trump-plan-to-spend-36-billion-in-military-funds-on-border-wall/2019/12/10/e534468a-1b9f-11ea-87f7-f2e91143c60d_story.html …

With a wintry mix of snow and rain expected tomorrow morning, I encourage all New Yorkers to use public transportation if you can! 

Regardless of how you travel, stay safe, look out for one another and budget extra time for your commute!

Last week, the world horrifically watched a 16-yr-old boy's final moments as he died from the flu in a @CBP cell.

Today, @hispaniccaucus & I call on this Administration to provide flu vaccinations & *ADEQUATE* medical care. We can't have another child/migrant die on our watch. pic.twitter.com/TKgrZG2T4m
The President is a continuing threat to our democracy, and he has left the House no choice. #DefendOurDemocracy https://twitter.com/RepAdamSchiff/status/1204410990445518848 …

The evidence is clear: the President pressured Ukraine to interfere in our 2020 elections, abusing his power and violating his oath of office. 

Since then, he has further obstructed Congress in carrying out its duties. 
 
He must be impeached. https://nyti.ms/2P6RjVu

Today I joined @HispanicCaucus Chair @JoaquinCastrotx, @CongressmanRuiz & others in calling on Customs Border Patrol to provide flu vaccine & adequate medical care to children and migrants in their custody. The deaths of young people in our government's care are unconscionable. pic.twitter.com/tFlg28aoUt
Here's my statement on the passing of Danny Kronenfeld: pic.twitter.com/QZSZYzOS7Y

We ❤️our interns! 

Head over to  http://velazquez.house.gov/services/internships … to apply for a Spring 2020 internship - and don’t wait!! 

Applications close December 13, 2019 at 11:59pm. pic.twitter.com/k6uAzSJhv8

Uneven & discriminatory application of the law is an injustice. 

There needs to be an immediate and swift investigation of these reports of systemic, abusive police behavior. 

Those responsible must be held fully accountable! https://nyti.ms/2P4QCMb

I was so proud to join our community in honoring Chief Secreto on his retirement. He has steadfastly worked to keep our @NYCHA communities safe, while always assisting the most vulnerable. A true friend of Brooklyn and all New York.  

Thank you! pic.twitter.com/OsMGpDPxFc

There is nothing more patriotic than ensuring all Americans can exercise their right to vote! 

That is why I voted today for H.R. 4, legislation to #RestoreTheVote!  

Now, we must push the Senate to take up this legislation!

Thanks @SenSchumer, @RonWyden @SenatorMenendez for including #PuertoRico Medicaid funding in the Senate appropriations bills. 

I'll continue working to see similar measures passed through the House!

Here’s a video reminding us that

A harmless child

16 yrs of age

With the flu

Was neglected by Border Patrol, who, when asked, provided an inaccurate account of his death.

The cruelty is the point. https://bit.ly/33RO6gF

On #InternationalVolunteerDay, I'm giving a shoutout to 1 of our many great orgs for volunteers w/ disabilities: @bbpnyc's Park Peers.

This program restores our parks while teaching professional skills to our neighbors w/ disabilities. Thank you! http://bit.ly/2Rkc8y9

Let's be clear: a group of wealthy people in @realDonaldTrump's Administration-who have never known hunger a day in their lives-are making it harder for poor people to secure food. Food! This is the height of cruelty and I will be working to stop it! https://nbcnews.to/2ONKyI0

That’s why I’ve fought to take private prisons out of immigration enforcement once & for all. It’s time we redirect taxpayer money away from unsafe & unhealthy conditions & towards humane practices. Click to read my full letter.
 https://bit.ly/2LlLQrF

PRIVATE IMMIGRATION PRISONS:

❌Incarcerate innocent children
❌Starve infants
❌Separate families
❌Inflict irreversible trauma
❌Murder asylum seekers

…did I forget anything?

Oh yeah, profit off the federally-endorsed suffering of people of color 💲 https://nyti.ms/34Oc7X3

This is an abuse of power. It is wrong. As the report states, it is "the act of a president who viewed himself as unaccountable and determined to use his vast official powers to secure his reelection."

The House's impeachment process will move forward, as it must.

The report released today by @HouseIntel should concern every American who cares about our democracy. It documents that @realDonaldTrump withheld military assistance, undermining U.S. national security interests, to advance his own political campaign.

Estoy orgullosa de haberme unido con la comunidad de Bushwick para protestar contra tácticas ilegales que intentan subir las rentas y desplazar a los residentes más vulnerables. Es inhumano que los inquilinos no tengan acceso a agua y al gas, sobre todo durante el invierno. pic.twitter.com/8y0m4zM5gG

.@senatemajldr & @SenateGOP GOP have held hostage nearly 400 pieces of legislation that will invest in, protect & advance our hardworking Americans; many of which I've co-authored & cosponsored, like #HR6 & #HR9, thanks to your tireless support. https://bit.ly/2DHShkp
Thank you for coming to visit us! Wish I had been there in person, but I'm still in NYC doing community work here. I hope to see you soon!
Thanks to the #AffordableCareAct, millions of Americans, including Latinos, have gained quality, affordable, and accessible health coverage and care. #GetCovered #OpenEnrollment
5 DÍAS quedan para poder obtener cobertura  http://www.cuidadodesalud.gov/es/  pic.twitter.com/R4cLW8cAlr

@wandavazquezg - Las mujeres en Puerto Rico han esperado suficiente. Ya es tiempo de que su gobierno tome acción ante la epidemia de violencia de género y declare una emergencia nacional. https://bit.ly/2RdqSiq
@wandavazquezg - the women in Puerto Rico have waited long enough. It's time that your government address the epidemic of gender violence and sign an emergency declaration!  https://bit.ly/2RdqSiq

I urge all New Yorkers to exercise caution today, especially during the evening commute. 

Please take care of one another, don't drive if you can avoid it and, if you must, be sure to leave lots of extra time.  #NYC #snowstorm
Debido a las inclemencias del tiempo estaremos cancelando la reunión pública en Woodhaven en la noche de hoy. ¡Mucho cuidado ante el mal tiempo que se espera!
Debido a las inclemencias del tiempo estaremos cancelando la reunión pública en Woodhaven en la noche de hoy. ¡Mucho cuidado ante el mal tiempo que se espera!
Due to inclement weather and to ensure safety we are postponing tonight's Woodhaven Town Hall. Please stay safe everyone.
Due to inclement weather and to ensure safety we are postponing tonight's Woodhaven Town Hall. Please stay safe everyone.
